comment.author: 58398754@N05
comment._content: Thank you for sharing all of these wonderful portraits.  I have looked through many of them and finally want to share my thoughts.  We see a portrait of a man who had a name, a family and a story, but now all of his history is lost.  I am quite saddened to see "Unidentified Soldier" under many of these portraits.  From ashes we were made and unto ashes we shall return.
